effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Earth Shock damage increased by 25%. Earthquake damage increased by 25%.
(4) Set: Spending Maelstrom grants you 5% increased critical strike chance and 10% increased critical damage dealt for 5 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 31,584 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 94,752 Nature Damage instead.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 958,226 Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Buckler of the Seas

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Ironforge.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
